title: ICYMI - Barack Obama on "A Promised Land," Nurturing Future Leaders and Black Lives Matter
itunes:title: ICYMI - Barack Obama on "A Promised Land," Nurturing Future Leaders and Black Lives Matter
description:
Barack Obama talks about his memoir "A Promised Land," discusses the goals of his many leadership programs around the world and gives his take on the Black Lives Matter movement.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
